Description:
Detects execution of the "esxcli" command with the "vm" flag in order to retrieve information about the installed VMs.

Author: Cedric Maurugeon
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: ESXi VM List Discovery Via ESXCLI
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/esxcli' and command like '%vm process%' and command like '% list'
